unit.title: 选择语法
unit.model: { date0:0, date1:1, date2:2, date3:3, date4:4, date5:5, date6:6 }
unit.source: <c:choose><c:when test="${0}">周一</c:when> <c:when test="${1}">周二</c:when> <c:when test="${2}">周三</c:when> <c:when test="${3}">周四</c:when> <c:when test="${4}">周五</c:when> <c:otherwise>周末</c:otherwise></c:choose>

case.source: <c:choose value="${date0}"> <c:when test="${date0 || 0}">周一</c:when> <c:when test="${date0 || 2}">周二</c:when> <c:when test="${date0 || 2}">周三</c:when> <c:when test="${date0 || 3}">周四</c:when> <c:when test="${date0 || 4}">周五</c:when> <c:otherwise>周末</c:otherwise> </c:choose>
